newStories.title: update.json should auto-convert string criteria to object format
newStories.description: When processing update.json, if acceptanceCriteria contains strings instead of {text, checked} objects, auto-convert them. This prevents format mismatch that breaks ralph-status and live updates.

acceptanceCriteria.text: In _ralph_apply_update_queue(), detect if criteria are strings
Auto-convert string criteria to {text: string, checked: false} format
Preserve existing object criteria as-is
ralph-status shows correct criteria count after conversion
Live progress bar updates work with converted criteria
Add test case in tests/test-ralph.zsh for criteria conversion

newStories.title: Live criteria updates still not working - verify full chain
newStories.description: Even after BUG-008, the live criteria progress bar doesn't update during iteration. Need to verify: fswatch running, FIFO working, polling loop running, display update working.

acceptanceCriteria.text: Add debug logging to _ralph_start_watcher() to confirm fswatch starts
Add debug logging to _ralph_start_polling_loop() to confirm loop starts
Verify RALPH_CRITERIA_ROW and RALPH_STORIES_ROW are set correctly
Test: Run Ralph, watch criteria bar update from 0/N to 1/N as Claude works
Remove debug logging after confirming fix works
Document in docs/live-updates.md how the system works

newStories.title: Expand brave.md to Progressive Disclosure Structure
newStories.description: Convert the single-file brave.md skill into a directory-based skill with SKILL.md router and workflows, following the github skill pattern.

acceptanceCriteria.text: Create skills/brave/ directory structure mirroring github skill pattern
Create SKILL.md with: YAML frontmatter, quick actions table, decision tree, and links to workflows
Create workflows/navigation.md covering: tabs, switch, navigate, back, forward commands
Create workflows/inspection.md covering: inspect, screenshot, errors commands
Create workflows/interaction.md covering: click, type, hover, scroll, press, drag commands
Create workflows/debugging.md covering: eval command and advanced verification patterns
Remove old brave.md single file after directory structure is complete
Update symlink at ~/.claude/commands/brave to point to new directory
No scripts/ directory needed - brave-manager is already an external CLI tool
